import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./EventsPage.css';import backgroundImage from'../images/background.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminPage=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[eventData,setEventData]=useState([]);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(true);const[serverError,setServerError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchEvents=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/events');const data=await response.json();if(response.ok){setEventData(data);}else{setServerError(data.message||'Error fetching events');}}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching events:',error);setServerError('Server error.
